data.op1: visible irregular dark patches on the photosphere of the sun resulting from a localised fall in the temperature to about 4000K
data.op3: dark patches on the surface of the sun which are cooler areas

data.question: Foucault experiment is proof of which one of the following ?
While Venus is seen only for one to two hours either after sunset or before sunrise. Jupiter is seen for the whole night whenever it is visible in the sky.
data.op1: Venus is much smaller than Jupiter
data.op2: Venus is far from the Earth than Jupiter
data.op3: Venus reflects lesser light of sun than Jupiter
data.op4: he orbit of Venus is inside the earth's orbit whereas the orbit of Jupiter lies outside the orbit of the earth
